ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and firmly fixed in it mountains;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the mountains He has fixed firmly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains, He made them firm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the mountains He set firm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And He made fast the hills,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the mountains! - He established them firm:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains He has fixed firmly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the mountains He set firm
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains He set firmly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:32] and has set firm the mountains, on the face of the earth so that it stays still,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And He made fast the hills) and He made the mountains firm,
